title: Development of Asynchronous Tutorials for Online Learning Environment Design

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: Learners aim to strengthen social sector job competencies at vocational training institutions and require flexible learning environments in time/space-constrained settings. While digital devices are provided, their proficiency with asynchronous learning materials is at a beginner level

learning_goals: Learners can independently navigate online asynchronous tutorials on a given topic and extract core information with over 80% accuracy.
Learners can use digital learning tools to create logical summaries of tutorial content.
Learners can propose three or more effective information utilization strategies in online learning environments through peer and self-assessment.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
